newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka benchmark 12-mth T-bill yields ease.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka benchmark 12-mth T-bill yields ease.

text.p: Average yields of three and six-month treasury bills decreased by 0.03 percentge points each, while 12-month yields fell by 0.14 at Tuesday's auctions, the Central Bank said.
Bids received Bids accepted Avg yield
NOTE - Bids in million rupees, yields in percent (previous week's yields in brackets).
